product_description: Who are we? name: HQOExpress Organic Garlic Powder – Non GMO, Kosher, USDA Certified Organic Garlic – Sweet and Sharp Aromatic Seasoning for Rubs, Marinades, Dressings and Burgers, 18 oz. Chef Jar
short_description: GARLIC POWDER: Mix up your very own steak rub, flavor your dressings or add a little extra zing to your meat dishes; garlic powder can also be used as a table seasoning for popcorn, pizza and potatoes

SHARP and SWEET: With a pungent flavor and distinctive aroma, garlic is one of the most used spices across worldwide cuisines; our organic garlic is harvested, dried and then cut and ground into this fine garlic powder
USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC: This 100% organic ground garlic is USDA Certified, kosher and non GMO - it is grown and processed without herbicides and pesticides for the highest level of safety and quality
SUSTAINABLY FARMED: We partner with farms in more than 40 countries. Our dehydrated garlic powder is sourced from China, Egypt and Mexico, and has full traceability from earth to table

FLAVOR CONSCIOUSLY: We are North America's largest supplier of USDA Organic and Non-GMO herbs and spices; we have ensured fair wages for our growers and high quality ingredients for our customers since 1977

short_description: Premium Quality: Crafted from the finest organic garlic, our garlic powder seasoning ensures flavor and aroma in every scoop. It is carefully sourced to ensure purity and freshness.

Versatile Uses: Garlic powder enhances a variety of dishes with its strong, hot flavor and penetrating aroma. Perfect for pasta, pizza, grilled chicken, sauces, marinades, dressings, and spice blends.
Organic And Kosher Certified: Our garlic powder is USDA organic and kosher certified. We ensure it meets high purity, quality, and sourcing standards, making it a trusted choice for your kitchen.
Convenient Resealable Bag: Enjoy our organic garlic powder in a convenient resealable bag that ensures lasting freshness. Each use is as perfect as the last, without compromising on quality.
About Us: Founded in 1976, Frontier Co-op has grown into a leader in natural, organic and fair trade botanicals. We are member-owned, and committed to purity, honesty and quality.

product_description: McCormick Organic Garlic Powder is an easy way to bring the sharp, savory essence of garlic to any recipe. USDA Certified Organic and Non-GMO Project Verified, our whole garlic cloves are ground and dried, resulting in vibrant, aromatic garlic in every bottle.Our organic garlic powder is mellower and deeper than raw garlic, yet equally robust. Powdered garlic disburses completely and evenly into many dishes. Use it in soups and stews, rubs, salad dressings and marinades. The larger bottle size is easy to handle and great for refilling spice jars, or can be stored in the pantry as is.
